name: Friday Night Funkin' NORMALIZED
description:
Hello! This is my first ever handmade FNF Mod, and it aims to "normalize" the game.

This project was mainly made so that I could get the game unblocked from my school, so expect the 3rd song of Week 4 to be renamed soon. This was also made so that I could get my friend to try playing FNF without him instantly hating it.

Windows version: SOON
